channel.title: Evoscape client Crash
channel.description:
So i DL Evoscape .. go to run the client.. and it crashed without even opening
this is what i have in notepad when i edit.. [code]@echo off title EvoScape "C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 EXIT[/code]
what's the fix :/ i'm also running 64bit and tried running the (64bit) run... and crashed...
help appreciated asap

item.title: Evoscape client Crash
item.dc:creator: @the_box_head the box head
item.description:
@the_box_head wrote:

ah ok[quote=“Dubstep, post:2, topic:360555”]the client files/cache are corrupt. exion has to update the link…

this should have gone in client help btw[/quote]
ah ok thnx, are you sure?

and yeh mod please move to client help. ty

Read full topic
